comments.comment:
Slabo si umiva roke, ampak drugace ok.

UPDATE: Hygiene problems persist. Mice and all sorts of critters are going to share your meal.
Best Bosnian Fast Food in Slovenia...Its for sure Halaal for Muslims.

Slow service. However good food for good price.
I was having 10 cevapcici and they asked 4€ for it.
worst kebab ever
The best jufka in town

A large restaurant with a long tradition along one of the major streets in Ljubljana. The food is okay and the portions are large, but the prices are somewhat steep for this part of town. They have a lot of parking space and a lot of sitting room, so there's usually no need to reserve a table. A selection of lunch menus is served daily, but they also have a large a la carte menu if nothing strikes your fancy.

Laura, our lovely waitress at Jurman bar, made our experience truly exceptional with her warm and attentive service. She had a genuine smile that brightened our evening, and her recommendations for the menu were spot on! Her professionalism and kindness added an extra touch of warmth to our visit, making us feel like valued guests. We were so impressed by her grace and dedication to ensuring we had a fantastic time. Kudos to Laura for making our night memorable!

Very very good food, we did not wait long although the place was full, service great and the atmosphere, as well.
Animals friendly. I do recommend the place if you are hungry and want to eat well.

In true Italian dinner style, our set dinner consisted of a Primo, a Secondi and a dessert. The primo was truffles fettuccine. Very creamy with strong truffles flavour, the pasta was cooked just right. The secondi was fried calamari with fries. Nothing to shout about but portion was big. The dessert was crepes with Nutella filling.

Special mention about their house white. At Euros 1.50 per glass, it is really value for money. Not fantastic wine but at this price point……
Tasty food for normal price. Ambient is pleasant.  We got fish plate very quickly. Menu is very long and you got a lot of choices.

The place offers a good value for money. The plate of fresh cooked meal is 8.5€ and that includes small salad. In the area this is the top restavrant. If they will keep it this way it is going to prosper. Slme.times.they offer vegetarian option.
It's ok. Would be nice to have some vegan options though. Salad and potatoes are ok, but some more options would be nice.

Cheap but OK. For local lunches.
You can eat for as cheap as 5 EUR.
Good restaurant for a nice lunch!
It is ok for lunch

name: Restavracija Mingo
address: Mingo restavracija, Letališka cesta 35, 1000 Ljubljana, Slovenia

comments.comment: Amazing, delicious food. All the time, at every order. Great delivery and service. Keep on!
Cozy place for a quick and cheap meal.
Miha is always smiling. Good daddy. :)
Great, affordable and good
Great food and nice service. The staff is very friendly. I will be happy to return.

name: Okrepčevalnica in slaščičarna Azzurro Đemail Ismaili s.p.

comments.comment: Good kebab and jufka although the pizza is a bit overpriced.
Lovely food, a but pricey but worth it if you love fish, I mean LOVE fish
3€ for 100g of bad salad
Trilece on top
Great coffee for no more than 1 EUR.  ;)

One of the rare restaurants in industrial part of the city. Solid food, lots of daily (lunch) menus. Sunny terrace, regretfully next to access road. Not recommended if you want to seat inside during cold periods, the ventilation is poor and your clothes's kitchen smell will remind you of the visit for days - so pick a sunny day and sit outside and you're good :)

Somewhat goos food - good for snacks. Things bothering me, are lack of food, in sense of, they ran out of certain daily menu really fast and suddenly, and while in those days, you can check menu of every restaurant on internet, you cannot check for Breza.
Prices range from 6€(fried cheese with french fries) onwards.
Breza is nice food place for the offices around. They have good lunch menu, nothing complicated but tasty. Service is fast and they have nice tables outside. Recommend for good food.
Good varety of daily menus. Solid food at reasonable price and fast service. Outdoor sitting/terrace is a big plus during summer.
Good food, average prices. I recommend their lasagna, we go there when we want to have a good one.

Old stale bread and half empty kebab. At the price of 4.50€ one would expect more. When asked to be a bit more generous as you are willing to pay more to get what you were supposed to you get laughed at and told off.
Used to be a regular customer but with an attitude like that they surely won’t see me again.
Perfect
Ordered AMERICAN HOT DOG, received? A kebab bun with an excessive amount of vegetables, nowhere near the shape or taste of a hot dog and the cheapest possible hot dog. Shame.
Bad service, rude staff, repeat the order five times and still get the wrong one. Waste of time and money!
Old toasted bread and cheap woody hot dogs from Lidl👎 if you ask for more salad, you get three more strips of salad. Bad..

Not so bad, but there are much better places to eat nearby. Food is blend-no taste and kinda small portions, only thing good about it, is price if yougo there for snack during work, it will cost you 4.9€ (as of this moment).
Good food for very modest price. Tables are a bit small and crammed.
Polite and very nice stuff, food is more than good for money.
Super hrana in postrežbs
Nice place for quick lunch.
Great place for business lunch if you are in the area. Nice setup inside. Free parking in front of the restaurant. Staff was very nice ans fast. Prices are normal for this type of restaurants.
Delicious 🤤
Delicious coffee, and nice stuff.
It is very good designed restaurant with potential, but opened only from 9AM to 2PM, and the quality of the food is not always as expected.
Amazing staff, offer and ambient. Highly recommended for quick business lunches with good quality food and service.
Good food for good price.
Okay place for a quick and cheap meal, but don't expect too much.
Excellent food but a bit pricey dishes
Very good food and service for a honest price!!
Great Slovenian and balcan food

name: Zlata ribica, gostinstvo, d.o.o. - V stečaju

comments.comment: The arrogance and ignorance of the waitresses. Very bad experience.
Best Chinese restaurant in town, great food and service, prices are very reasonable, parking gets a bit full so not so easy to park sometimes. They also offer many types of tasty sushi!

We stopped by for a late lunch, since we heard good things about it. Staff was constantly polite and welcomed us kindly. The service was quick and friendly. We had two chicken dishes (curry & vegetables with almonds) with rice. Both were  alright, just not strong in flavor. Besides, we enjoyed a sweet-sour soup with was good. Lastly, the yasmin tea was tasty as well. The location is central, with parking possibilities. The interior design is unique with Chinese characteristics. The price for tea and soup was alright. However, the chicken/rice dishes in my opinion a bit too expensive.
At the end we were served a plum apperative and a good luck cookie, each. Very kind!!!
Overall, interesting place to have lunch at.
Friendly staff, big selection of menu, a place to go when you are craving for sushi and chinese food at the same time in Ljubljana. We will be back for sure.
Sushi was really good.
Good sushi 🍣,  very tasty fried fruit 😋

Sunday? Hungry? Near BTC? Ajda Burger is a great option.
One of the most affordable restaurants with a good selection in the menu: Burgers, chicken burgers, salads or healthy plates. Ajda burger is a great option, located in the neighborhood of BTC, this option is always great if you are hungry and want a great money-value meal. Open until late night including Saturdays and Sundays which is appreciated.
I very often come with my wife here as I enjoy Ajda burger and always there is a salad or grill vegetable option for her.
The staff always friendly and listening to customers… highly recommended!

Great meal, good service
Even late night  - thank you

This place is one of my favorite places to go in Slovenia. All of the staff manner are kindly. The quality of the ingeridients is high and always you taste fresh things. This is also nice to see this place keep the quality during time.

The food is really delicious, especially the burgers. Very well made with great presentation. They even offer some Balkan dishes for example, Čevapi or Burek. Employees are very kind and the service is fast. Would recommend to anybody with an empty stomach!
Food was great

The best Chinese restaurant in Ljubljana. The eggplant on hot plate (jajčevec na vroči plošči) is exceptional, had it 3 times so far, and couldn't believe the taste each time. I normally dislike eggplants but I urge everyone to try this.
There is an option to have it with meat, I always order the veg-only version.
Some of the other dishes we tried were young peas in a pod, tofu in gong bao wok and sichuan tofu. All were great, but nothing beats the eggplants. The portions are big, so we usually order 1 dish per 2 persons.
My friends had a bunch of sushi and really liked it.

Me and my family love this restaurant. It has nice ambient, a big parking for free in front of the restaurant and delicious food. What we liked is that they are creative with flavours and not all food tastes the same  which might be the case in some chinese restaurants. They have good noodles with shrimps, shrimos in tempura, rice gnocchi with egg and chicken and shrimps on a hot plate. Sushi looked good as well, but we did not try it yet as it is very hard to get a good sushi in Slovenia. They could improve in the dessert section. Desserts are ok, but as they are very good at other dishes, they could be as well at the last sweet part. Perhaps they could add some more Japan sweets as they have also Japan kitchen, such as Japanese cheesecake, Matcha Swiss roll, Dorayaki, chocolate Chiffon cake, Purin and much more. Overall we were all very satisfied with the food and will return for sure. I highly reccomend this restaurant.
Very large portions, delicious sushi and chicken dishes.
Very good Chinese food. We are here 1 to 2 times a month and we have never been disappointed. They also have company dinners or lunches here.

We have been a lot of times in Chang Koper which is great and this was oir first time in Ljubljana. We were thinking that probably it will not be on the same level but we were very wrong. Everything  from the place itself,  the service and food is just amazing! Highly recommended!

DiVino restaurant in BTC Ljubljana is a hidden gem. I recently had the opportunity to dine there and was blown away by the lamb leg. It was cooked to perfection, juicy and tender, with a perfectly crispy crust. The accompanying vegetables were also perfectly cooked and seasoned.

I also appreciated the attentive and friendly service. The staff was knowledgeable about the menu and made great recommendations.

Overall, I had a wonderful dining experience at DiVino. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a delicious and memorable meal.

I would definitely recommend the lamb leg at DiVino to anyone looking for a truly special dining experience.

We had a great evening here. The food was really delicious and so was the local Slovenian Wine. The staff was very happy, polite and ready to help. I would highly recommend if you want and Italian style restaurant.

This restaurant has a lot to offer. The food was good and the service pleasant. The interior of the place and how the waiters are dressed give you the feeling you are at a high-end place. The location, however, is not glamorous at all. The restaurant is located in between the mall, supermarkets and outlets, and across a Subways. If it would have been located in Ljubljana city center, then it would have been a hit, but now it felt a bit odd as a dinner place. For lunch time, it would probably be a nice/better option as the area will then be more lively.

Delicious food with great staff. We had Cesar Salad and white chocolate mousse with mango sauce and strawberries aside. The food is presented really tasty and a real eye catcher. Thank you for a great evening!
A sweet and fine dining experience with a very casual and trendy staff and some of the best wines ! #maresanto
One of the best restaurants in Ljubljana. Very good cook, very kind staff. And the best goulash I have ever tasted.
Very nice and cute place. Waitor was very friendly and helpful. The portion was very big, cod not even finish. Very reasonable prices. Come back for sure and recommend to everyone!
A great place, nice people, delicius food and good price
Nice little restaurant, with a good food, fast service and kind staff.
A little cozy restaurant on the outskirts of Ljubljana. The owner is very friendly and helpful!
far from the others, najaci burger at woop arena, we'll come again!

Nice place for Balkan food in BTC.

They have good čevapi, pleskavica and other balkan dishes, but from time to time they made them to dry.

Service I gave them 3 stars because it depends from day to day who is serving you and what kind of day they have.

Some prices are to high, especially added kajmak... almost 3€ for scoop of it... simply to much.

Alltogether its OK, I would recommend it for fast or long lunch.

Very good restaurant, with a tipical balkan dishes at very fair price. They have open salad bar, where you can choose between salad and side dishes as a part of your order. Portions are large and staff is friendly. Despite inflation prices did not increase too mutch
Service speak great English and is friendly. I will come back next time. Thank you.
Delicious food, friendly and attentive servers, large parking place close by.
Amazing! Quality of the food is on top and the stuff is amazing! Atmosphere is also superb!

Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5)

I recently had the pleasure of visiting McDonald's, and I must say, it was a truly wonderful experience from start to finish. From the moment I walked through the doors, I was greeted with warm smiles and a friendly atmosphere.

The efficiency and speed of service at McDonald's never cease to impress me. Despite the bustling crowd, the staff handled the rush with ease, ensuring that everyone was promptly attended to. I appreciated how well-organized and streamlined the ordering process was, allowing me to get my meal quickly and effortlessly.

Now, let's talk about the food. McDonald's continues to deliver on its promise of tasty, satisfying meals. The menu boasts a wide range of options to suit every craving and preference. From their iconic classics to the latest limited-time offerings, there is always something new and exciting to try. On this particular visit, I indulged in their renowned Big Mac, and it lived up to its reputation. The juicy beef patty, special sauce, and fresh ingredients came together harmoniously, creating a mouthwatering burger that left me wanting more.

What impressed me even more was the attention to quality and consistency. Regardless of whether I'm at my local McDonald's or traveling to a different city or country, I can always count on the same great taste and high standards. This level of consistency is a testament to their commitment to providing an exceptional dining experience for their customers.

Furthermore, the cleanliness and ambiance of the restaurant were commendable. The dining area was well-maintained, inviting, and comfortable, making it a pleasant place to enjoy my meal. The staff members were attentive, ensuring that tables were promptly cleaned and any requests were met with a smile.

Lastly, I must commend McDonald's on their dedication to social responsibility and community involvement. Their initiatives to support local communities, promote sustainability, and provide scholarships demonstrate a genuine commitment to making a positive impact.

In conclusion, my visit to McDonald's was nothing short of outstanding. From the friendly service and efficient operations to the delicious food and comfortable environment, every aspect exceeded my expectations. McDonald's remains a go-to destination for a satisfying meal, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a consistently excellent dining experience.

Thank you, McDonald's, for consistently delivering on your promise of quality, convenience, and deliciousness. You've certainly earned my loyalty as a happy and satisfied customer.

A good restaurant with car service, you can eat inside and there are tables on the street.  Only classic cash registers and a clean toilet.  Children's corner on the street and some tables in the open air.  Nearby parking, lots of places.  The largest shopping center of the capital nearby provides a constant influx of customers.  The staff speaks English, politely and quickly serves.  Quality is on top.

Nobody speaks any language. Students find very funny when they don't understand the guest they are serving . We tried English and German too. They think it's funny when they are repeating things on their motherlanguage. Poor education...No soap in the toilet.
Quick service. Good location. Drive-through or eat there. Generous portion of ice-cream. Tasty everything. Loved it. Definitely recommend the location.
When you open your to go bag and the first thing you see is this...

I got the meat option which was meh. The chicken was bland and cardbordy. On the other hand the vegetarian option with the vegetable patty was incredible. Depends on what you get. Their cookies are also amazing.
The sandwiches were very tasty but the fries were stale and the portion was very small. Prices a bit too high.

They offer vegan options but every time I come, the staff seems unamused and cant even tell me which sauces are vegan. This time in disturbed voice:"ugh.... the garlic one..   then mayo, and the other white sauce, i dont know."

So I took Ketchup on my own guess.

I love Subway from games and the Dunajska one was great. But this vibe is rly offputting. I just want to eat.

Subway had an excellent service. We were really quickly in line and the staff was very friendly and helpful when deciding what sandwich to order.

We also could use a student coupon which gave us a free drink and a cookie.

The sandwich was really soft and tasty and would recommend to visit Subway at least once in your life.
Super hrana in strezba. Would recommend.
Uneatable. It's included but the risk not worth! Unsecured buffet. No one is holding on covid security no masks. Also coffee isn't a coffee just looks like but untrinkable
Average breakfast buffet .. Nothing extraordinary !!

Breakfast at the Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel is my favorite, and it has significantly changed my usual stance on English breakfasts at hotels. Typically, I don't opt for breakfast, but this experience was a delightful exception. The quality of food here stands out in comparison to many other hotels I've stayed at. During my week-long stay, I had the opportunity to try almost everything they offered. The salads were fresh, with a variety of sauces, olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Yogurts and toppings were available. The hot foods, including scrambled eggs, bacon, sausages, and roasted vegetables, were delicious. They also provided an impressive selection of cheeses, salamis, and the like. The dumplings were average, but everything else was nearly perfect. I would consider staying at this hotel again, if only for the breakfast.

Service was satisfying, too.
Excellent breakfast
Perfect. Good food, even better service. All recommendations. 😍

One of the gratest experiences in Ljubljana...
Restaurant with history, a reminder of some better cosy times...
Far from most of the unpersonalized and fancy slow food, expensive wannabe restaurants without soul...

Good prices, hilarious and profesional owner, absolutely gorgeous food...
Will be back soon...
Best place to eat in town.

Owner is very friendly,service very quick and food very good.
Perfect
Good restaurant. A bit hard to park but it's worth it.We had a party there. It was good.

Good plant based food, modern and tasteful ambient, kind service. I really love the burger and their sweet potato fries are the best ever. I also really like their daily classic lunches like meatballs, stuffed bell peppers, mashed potatoes...
What I dislike are the prices because they are getting absurdly expensive. Another thing I am not a fan of are the dirty toilets. Inappropriate for a place with such good food and high prices.
Another issue is that they offer cow's milk. They're supposed to be a vegan place, so be careful when you order a cappuccino, it could come with animal secretions. The cow's milk coffee is actually cheaper than the plant version, they serve it as a deafult. Apparently money > values.

Great vegan bistro! I especially like the changing daily lunch, the bianca pizza and the bounty coconut chocolate cake - YUM! The lunch price is ok but the cake price is quite expensive comped to the size of the piece.

Definitely the best vegan Pizza ever!!!
The only thing which wasnt very good was the spinach soup but I guess its of personal preference.

All the other food (especially the cakes) are of amazing quality and the staff is very nice. Definitely try it out if you would like to have a special journey in the world of vegan good and delicious food!
wow what an experience. Perfect service and great, healthy food. This restaurant makes the world a better place. Thanks to the owner and all the workers there. Can recommend going there 100%

Barbarella is a vegan bistro. The space is comfortable, cozy, well zoned, and well decorated. The staff is very pleasant and helpful, the  food was served very quickly.
What I can say about the food. I'm not a vegan, but I enjoy vegan food. Barbarella has a really good selection of food and drinks - pizzas,  salad, bowls, smoothies, deserts. All is highly esthetic, portions are big, but I was not impressed much by the taste. The deserts look yummy, and I would come again to taste some of them. The prices for food are reasonable considering that it's vegan, the deserts are too expensive IMHO.

Many shops close early around 3:00 or 4:00pm. Food is good but is expensive, since its a takeaway type of a arrangement, although there are common seats if you would like to sit down and eat, but self service only. Restaurant prices for fast food type service. Food quality is good.
Pretty good open air, self service food court. It includes everything from burgers to thai food, and includes a decent vegan, gluten free and LCHF menu at certain food stands.
Great selection nice place fast service.

Excellent concept of having small standa of certain known goos restaurant in Slovenia in one place, with common eating area. So it is good choice, if you want to go eat with bigger group and everyone wants something else.
Only downside - in my opinion, quite expensive considering this is for snacking.

Used to be one of my favorite places to eat after work. Especially Chutys with great Pad Thai. But since reopening (due to quarantine) the portions are really much smaller - too small... Other stands seem to keep with good standard. But DONT GO TO CHUTYS. NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY.

A Taste of Argentina's Culinary Excellence in Ljubljana's Shopping District

Nestled in the heart of Ljubljana's vibrant shopping district, I had the pleasure of discovering a true culinary gem that transported me to the flavors of Argentina. This restaurant, which specializes in Argentina beef, not only delivered on its promise but also surprised me with exceptional wines and mouthwatering pizza.

From the moment I stepped into the restaurant, the ambiance set the stage for an extraordinary dining experience. The warm and inviting décor, combined with the aroma of sizzling meats, instantly piqued my appetite. As a lover of steak, I was eager to indulge in the renowned Argentina beef that the restaurant is famous for.

The beef dishes that graced my table were nothing short of spectacular. Cooked to perfection, each bite was a symphony of tenderness and flavor, a testament to the quality of the ingredients and the mastery of the chefs. The rich, robust flavors of Argentina beef shone through, leaving an unforgettable impression on my taste buds.

While the restaurant's specialty was undoubtedly the beef, the surprises didn't end there. The exceptional selection of wines further elevated the dining experience. The staff's knowledge and passion for wine pairings were evident as they guided me through the options, ensuring that each sip perfectly complemented the dishes.

A delightful surprise awaited me in the form of the restaurant's pizza offerings. The pizza, often overshadowed in a beef-focused establishment, was a revelation. The thin, crispy crust provided the perfect canvas for a medley of fresh toppings, resulting in a pizza that rivaled the best pizzerias in town.

The attentive service was the icing on the cake, with the staff striking the right balance between professionalism and friendliness. Their dedication to providing a memorable experience was evident in every interaction, enhancing the overall enjoyment of the meal.

In conclusion, the Argentina restaurant in Ljubljana's shopping district is a culinary treasure trove that seamlessly blends the flavors of Argentina with a local touch. From the exceptional beef dishes that are a carnivore's dream to the surprising excellence of the pizza and the impressive wine selection, this restaurant delivers a feast for the senses. Whether you're a meat enthusiast or simply seeking a dining experience that stands out, this establishment is a must-visit.

Even though it's in a bustling shopping area, they've created a little oasis of tranquility, that takes you to laid back Spanish charm. The service and food are both excellent, meat really just melts in your mouth. It's a bit pricey, but occasionally well worth it.

The meat in the burger and sweet potato were delicious, but the burger was just too small for the price. The service was excellent and professional, also the ambience inside and outside is very pleasant and nicely decorated. I recommend!
Excellent and tasty pizza. Friendly and helpful staff, pleasant atmosphere in the restaurant

High quality meat! Very tasty. Also gin tonic was nice. However for highly rated restaurant they should work on professionalism of their staff. We ordered a plate of 4 steaks and would actually appreciate to be told which steak is which. Also they could be a bit nicer and not try to make you feel like they are doing you a favour when they serve you.
We did not find this pizzeria on this address
The burger was delicious. It is a bit pricey but worth it. The food court area is really nice and organised. There are many other food options to chose from. Best burger in Ljubljana.

Great burgers. Fries are mediocre. But the Bevog beer goes superbly with the burger. It is a killer combination. The place is a little “village” of all sorts of food styles but I’m a guy of simple pleasures, so in combination with simple outdoor benches and tables makes this an enjoyable experience after or before some shopping.
When a local burger place becomes just another copy of McDonald's. With the difference that the big corporation has staff better trained in communication with customers.

This was one of the best burgers in Ljubljana. Since they expanded, the consistency and quality are just not there anymore. Sadly, they also turned up the prices a notch. Or three. It's still an OK place to eat a burger, but there are lots of better ones.

So, what is here to say? 🤔 Great quality of food, no matter what you take, burger 🍔, steak 🥩 sandwich or fries 🍟, you will get great delicious 🤤 food 👏🏻
I highly recommend LeBrie 🍔 with extra bacon 🥓 jalapeños 🌶️ or the chili-cheese steak sandwich 🤤

The only bad thing I can say is that they don't have here the chicken nuggets, chicken burger and milk shake like in HoodBurger Citycenter place.

But it's still great place for eating one of the BEST 🍔🍟 in Ljubljana 👏🏻

Amazing sport park, full of adrenaline, parking was for free for the time we spent. We staff was very helpful for making this experience unforgettable. The park is very roomy, with all different kind of trampolines. Kids enjoy it.
Great place to take your kids to.
Great for kids

Very bad trampolines
Mentor Žiga is the friendliest
Great park, cute experience.

That was a surprise discovery for me, found it on the FMGF app and I loved the food! They also have vegan 🥑 options, but the burgers and desserts 🧁 are amazing! Had the apple strudl after a long time and it was amazing! Highly recommend to gluten intolerant people and vegans. Will definitely be back when in Ljubljana! Kudos to this place!

One of really rare gluten free and also milk free option for lunch in slovenia! Beside all the dishes are delicious ! Strongly recommend if you're gluten intolerant or also if you're not , because its tasteful and healthy 😊 im super happy they exist!

The food was delicious, but the place has to little places to sit and enjoy your meal. The tables are on the way to the supermarket entrance so it was not quite enjoyable sitting there. They offered us a place outside but it was too hot. So 5 stars for the food, you have a great menu that is also safe for celiacs, but -1 for the accommodation.
it was delicious! plus both girls working were super nice! 10/10
Very good vegan burger! 😋👌 Please, more vegan dishes and less meat options, that would be much much better (for the animals and vegans). 😁😊
